<-- In gladiator@y..., gladiator@y... wrote:
> 
> Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
> gladiator group:
> 
> Should the people who work on tournament 
> scenarios be allowed to participate in 
> the tournament? 
> 
>   o yes 
>   o no 


Your vote is needed in this poll [5 votes isn't enough).  The 
gladiator tournament group will start to work on tournament scenarios 
within a few weeks and before proceeding need to know how this group 
feels on this topic.

I will promise you that before the tournament starts a list will be 
posted of types of characters found in the tournament scenarios and 
the highest experience level they will be.  In addition, basic 
information about the scenarios will be given out to help participants 
 pick their team wisely.
